description: Create a Supply Arrangement (SA) to build a pool of pre-qualified suppliers for the procurement of Video Surveillance (VS) equipment and systems. SA’s will be issued to qualified suppliers on a national basis and be available for use by all federal departments and agencies. There are mandatory Security Requirements with this requirement. For a supplier to be declared responsive, the supplier must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening, issued by the Contract Security Program.
tags: payments and settlements term and condition
full_summary:
# Video Surveillance Supply Arrangement

## Title: Request for Supply Arrangement

### Tender Information

* **Tender Reference Number:** WS4310175052-Doc4310182442
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4310175052
* **Publication Date:** February 8, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 23, 2029, 2:00 PM ET
* **Amended Date:** February 26, 2024

### Contract Information

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Supply Arrangement
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Brian Moore, TCSP/PWGSC
* **Contact Email:** [brian.moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:brian.moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone:** None
* **Contact Fax:** None

### Detailed Requirements

Canada has a requirement to create a national Supply Arrangement (SA) to procure Video Surveillance (VS) equipment and systems. The SA will be available for use by all federal departments and agencies. This requirement includes mandatory security requirements. Suppliers must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening, issued by the Contract Security Program, to be declared responsive.

### Tender Documents

* **Tender Notice:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18749401?extsite=MTg3NDk0MDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18749401?extsite=MTg3NDk0MDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* **Attachment:** None
